Class SpchkNoun

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class SpchkNoun
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

SpchkNoun class identify any errors in the Noun word and correct it. Error type may be in case ending, root word, similar sound letter, Adjacent key errors,.....

See Also:

Constructor Summary
SpchkNoun()
          SpchkNoun class that enables identify errors in word (noun), Case endings, Adjacent key errors and Similar sound errors and correct it and it will generate the suggestion based on the error

Constructor Detail

SpchkNoun

public SpchkNoun()
SpchkNoun class that enables identify errors in word (noun), Case endings, Adjacent key errors and Similar sound errors and correct it and it will generate the suggestion based on the error

function for checking the case endings in Noun like iTam, uTan,il, aal, uTaiya, u, aaka, kaL,...
Parameters:

Returns:
where the errors occured ( in case endings)

dicsearch

public static boolean dicsearch(java.lang.String root)
Checks the word in Dictionary.
Returns:
true - word is correct, false - word may be incorrect.

check_u

public static boolean check_u(byte[] bstr,
                              int blen)
Checks the error is in u type case ending.
Returns:
true - error is in this type, false - error is not in this type and sets the correct suggestion according to the case ending.
